org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: python -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install --upgrade pip pip install -r requirements.txt pip install pytest pytest-cov pylint black flake8 || true

python -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install --upgrade pip --quiet pip install -r requirements.txt --quiet pip install pylint flake8 --quiet || true pylint app/ --exit-zero --output-format=text > pylint-report.txt || true flake8 app/ --max-line-length=120 --format=html --htmldir=flake8-report || true

python -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install --upgrade pip --quiet pip install -r requirements.txt --quiet pip install pytest pytest-cov --quiet || true pytest tests/ --cov=app --cov-report=xml --cov-report=html --cov-report=term || true
